name: Dreamin' of DnD
description:
Controls:

WASD to move.

Left Mouse to throw Dice.

Spacebar to Jump

Collect dice, health pots, coins, and the key needed to face the boss by simply walking over them.

Introduction

Wake up! You play as Silas, a young lad running late for his favorite DnD session. Unfortunately, in your hurry, you trip and stumble, falling down a flight of stairs. When you wake up you find yourself in an unknown location, with your dice as your only weapon. Battle your way through an goblin fortress and slay the great goblin king! Can you ascend back to material plane? Or will your fate be sealed in the goblin's fortress?

How To Play

Controls:
  • WASD to move.
  • Left Mouse to throw Dice.
  • Spacebar to Jump Collect dice, health pots, coins, and the key needed to face the boss by simply walking over them.

    • Installation
  1. Download DreaminOfDnD_Final.zip
  2. Save it to your desktop
  3. Right Click > Extract Here
  4. Open folder and double click on the .EXE file
  5. Note, the game name is DreaminOfDnD, but the exe is called Excalibur - this was the name of our game before we settled on DreaminOfDnD
